section.p: allows you to customize the layout and branding of a marketplace to suit your organization's standards and requirements. This includes the colors, fonts, background images, and logos displayed to the marketplace visitors.
You define the layout and branding of a marketplace in a style sheet and in files and images referenced by it.

ol.li: Log in to the administration portal.
Download the branding package by using the Customize layout menu option in the Marketplace menu of the administration portal. The branding package is provided as a ZIP file.
Extract the ZIP file to a local directory.

Create an archive (ZIP) containing your customized files.
The customized branding must have the same structure as the original branding in the branding-package.zip file.
Provide this archive to the platform operator so that he can deploy your customized branding package.
Ask the platform operator for the URL of the deployed customized style sheet.

To load the customized layout:
On the Customize layout page, select the marketplace and enter the URL provided by the platform operator pointing to your customized style sheet. If no URL is set, the default style sheet is used.
By default, the URL is as follows:
https://<host_fqdn>:8443/<new-folder-name>/css/mp.css
<host_fqdn> is the fully qualified name or IP address of the host used to access , 8443 is the port. Omit the port if is operated with its proxy. <new-folder-name> is the name of the folder containing the customized files.
To verify the branding, go to the respective marketplace and log in again.
